data.introduce: 国际客票变更搜索AirIntlReShop服务为用户提供了查询国际客票变更费等航班信息功能的服务。
data.functions: 支持根据航段信息，票号，查询日期来查询国际客票变更费等航班信息；
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TRR_VoluntaryReshopRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"BookingOrderID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"TicketInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票信息","children":[{"name":"TicketNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号：13位票号或14位票号","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"ValidatingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票的VC方对应的两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"HostCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"CRS时是1E ICS时是航空公司两字代码","children":[]},{"name":"TicketingCity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票地三字码","children":[]},{"name":"DepartmentCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"   ","description":"CRS 当是AGENT 9或者是USER GROUP 17且在PEK099时显示TST，否则是3个空格。 ICS 当是AGENT 9或者是USER GROUP 17且在PEK099时显示TST，否则是C+航空公司代码。","children":[]},{"name":"OfficeCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更操作office","children":[]},{"name":"IataCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更操作office的IATA NO：ICS 写入AGNET CODE，如果AGENT CODE为空，则写入99999992。 CRS如果在IATA NUMBER 不为空的情况下，写入IATA NUMBER，如果IATA NUMBER为空，则写入AGENT CODE。 如果都为空，写入99999992","children":[]}]},{"name":"Segments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原行程的航段信息：已飞航班和地面段可以不填写到Segment中","children":[{"name":"Segment","type":"object","quantity":"0..16","default":"","description":"所有未飞航班的航班信息","children":[{"name":"FlightId","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旧航段的编号：对应的Segments/Segment/FlightId","children":[]},{"name":"MarketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售航空公司两字码","children":[]},{"name":"FlightNo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号：1、正常航班：填写航班号 2、OPEN航班：填写“OPEN”","children":[]},{"name":"CabinCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[]},{"name":"OperatingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureDateTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期时间,格式：YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureCity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面中的机场三字码","children":[]},{"name":"ArrivalDateTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"日期时间,格式：YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI","children":[]},{"name":"ArrivalCity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面中的机场三字码","children":[]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型：1、正常航班：必填；2、OPEN航班：不填写此字段","children":[]},{"name":"BookingStatus","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位状态：1、正常航班：必填 2、OPEN航班：OP","children":[]},{"name":"OperatingCabinCode","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运航班舱位","children":[]},{"name":"OperatingFlightNo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"实际承运航班号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"NewSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更行程的筛选条件：仅填写变更航段；当前仅支持航段一对一的变更，且不能变更OD","children":[{"name":"NewSegment","type":"object","quantity":"0..16","default":"","description":"变更行程的筛选条件","children":[{"name":"Origin","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更航段起始地","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市或者机场三字码","children":[]},{"name":"Type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票旅客类型：ADT/CNN/INF等国际运价的标准旅客类型三字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Destination","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"变更航段到达地","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlexInterval","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"灵活日期范围筛选：仅支持最多7天的范围","children":[{"name":"From","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定搜索日期前的范围：0-3，表示指定日期前0-3天","children":[]},{"name":"To","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定搜索日期后的范围：0-3，表示指定日期后0-3天","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartDate","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期：格式YYYY-MM-DD","children":[]},{"name":"DepartBeforeTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最晚出发时间：格式：HH:MI","children":[]},{"name":"DepartAfterTime","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"最早出发时间：格式：HH:MI","children":[]},{"name":"CoveredSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新行程对应的旧航段信息：当前仅支持航段一对一的变更，且不能变更OD","children":[{"name":"FlightId","type":"object","quantity":"0..16","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"ReshopPreference","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FareRuleRestriction","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际运价的参数","children":[{"name":"Changeable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Refundable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"upgradable","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"新票运价必须是可升舱的：true：新运价必须是可升舱的；fasle：无限制","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareTypes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"新票运价类型，可指定一个或者多个","children":[{"name":"FareType","type":"array","quantity":"0..4","default":"","description":"运价类型：PUBLIC：公布运价 PRIVATE：私有/协议运价 IT_PUBLIC：IT公布运价 IT_PRIVATE：IT私有/协议运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"AccountCode","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[{"name":"Code","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票运价的accountCode","children":[]},{"name":"AllowBlank","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新票运价是否可以是其他运价：true：可以是其他运价；false:必须是此accountCode的运价 不填写时，可以是其他运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"PassengerType","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客类型：国际运价标准旅客类型三字码","children":[{"name":"Type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"ExactPtcMatch","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回指定旅客类型的运价：true:仅返回指定旅客类型的运价；false:不限制 不填写时，可以是其他旅客类型的运价","children":[]}]},{"name":"CurrencyOfPayment","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"新票的支付货币代码","children":[]},{"name":"Waiver","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"豁免代码：01 DEATH 02 ILLNESS 03 ACT_OF_GOD 04 COURT_APPEARANCE 05 MILITARY 06 TOUR_PACKAGE 07 LACK_DOCUMENTATION","children":[]},{"name":"FlightPreference","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航班的偏好信息","children":[{"name":"Cabins","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位等级","children":[{"name":"Cabin","type":"array","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"ECONOMY：取值： ECONOMY 、PREMIUM_ECONOMY 、BUSINESS、 FIRST、Y 、W 、C、 F","children":[]}]},{"name":"AllowCodeshare","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"是否允许返回代码共享航班：可以不设置，默认为true，表示允许返回代码共享航班","children":[]},{"name":"AllowInterline","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"是否允许返回联运航班：可以不设置，默认为true ture-联运结果允许online和interline false-联运结果仅返回online","children":[]},{"name":"FlightsAllowedMarketingCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"允许的市场方航司：可以不设置，默认为空，表示允许所有市场方航空公司，设置后不能使用flightsForbiddenMarketingCarriers","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航司两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightsForbiddenMarketingCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"不允许返回的承运方航司：可以不设置，默认为空，表示允许所有承运方航空公司，设置后不能使用flightsAllowedMarketingCarriers","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FaresAllowedCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"可以使用所有航空公司发布的运价：可以不设置，默认为空，表示可以使用所有航空公司发布的运价；设置后表示只能使用这些航空公司的运价","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightsAllowedOperatingCarriers","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"允许返回的承运航司：可以不设置，默认为空，表示可以使用所有航空公司发布的运价；设置后表示只能使用这些航空公司的运价","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"0..99","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ProcessVirtualCabinCombos","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否使用品牌模式：true：品牌模式 false：物理舱等模式","children":[]},{"name":"CabinCombo","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"舱等或品牌的组合模式：1、当processVirtualCabinCombos=false时，cabinCombo对应值说明如下： 1）CHEAPEST：舱等最低价模式 2）SAME_CABIN_MODE：多服务等级跨舱等，即在preferences-cabins-cabin中设置多个舱等值时，返回各舱等对应的最低价 3）ALL_MODE：舱等之间可以自由组合 4）UPSELL_MODE：同品舱等组合优先，缺失的舱等与邻近的高等级舱等组合 2、当processVirtualCabinCombos=true时，cabinCombo对应值说明如下： 1）SAME_CABIN_MODE：仅相同品牌进行组合 2）SAME_PHYSICALCABIN_ALL_MODE：相同舱等下的所有品牌可以自由组合，仅品牌模式下适用 3）SAME_PHYSICALCABIN_UPSELL_MODE：相同舱等下同品牌优先组合，缺失的品牌可与同舱等下邻近的高等级品牌组合，仅品牌模式下适用。 4）ALL_MODE:品牌之间可以自由组合，不受同舱等的限制 5）UPSELL_MODE：同品牌组合优先，缺失的品牌与邻近的高等级品牌等组合，不受同舱等的限制","children":[]},{"name":"BrandSource","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"品牌来源：ATPCO：ATPCO标准来源 SITA：仅发给航信的brand数据，当前brandSource为SITA","children":[]},{"name":"BrandCommercialName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"品牌名称：航司可以渠道channel发布不同的品牌，接口支持搜索航司指定渠道发布的品牌运价","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema:
[{"name":"TRR_VoluntaryReshopRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ProcessResult","type":"array","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"reshop结果的状态","children":[{"name":"Status","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"状态：取值： OK：座位confirmed RQ：waitlist SA：standby NS：不占座婴儿 OPEN：OPEN航段 ARNK：地面段","children":[]},{"name":"Messages","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"error/warning message：error/warning message","children":[{"name":"Message","type":"object","quantity":"0..10","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"MessageType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信息类型：取值：WARNING ERROR NOTE","children":[]},{"name":"Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"DataLibrary","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"新票及原票信息","children":[{"name":"Passengers","type":"array","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"旅客的一个reshop结果：当前reshop不支持多人","children":[{"name":"Passenger","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Id","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税的ID号：dataLibrary-Taxes中的id","children":[]},{"name":"Ptcs","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[{"name":"PassengerType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型：旅客类型，如1名旅客有多个PTC，可以都写上。","children":[]}]},{"name":"CurrencyOfPayment","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Waiver","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"如果豁免适用，此处输出以下取值：
						ACT_OF_GOD
						COURT_APPEARANCE
						DEATH
						ILLNESS
						LACK_DOCUMENTATION
						MILITARY
						TOUR_PACKAGE
						与TRI指令对应关系如下：
						01 DEATH
						02 ILLNESS
						03 ACT_OF_GOD
						04 COURT_APPEARANCE
						05 MILITARY
						06 TOUR_PACKAGE
						07 LACK_DOCUMENTATION","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Fares","type":"array","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"新票/原票运价信息：新票/原票运价信息 此处新旧运价的信息都会输出，可以通过ID号来区分输出的新运价还是旧运价。判断方法：原票最后一个fareID+1就是第一个新运价，且后面序号的都是新运价。 优先输出新运价，即：系统算出来的运价 之后输出旧运价，即：我们在请求中dataLibrary->fares中写的运价。","children":[{"name":"Fare","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Id","type":"string","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Origin","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"运价始发地：票价的始发地。输出为：机场或城市三字码。","children":[]},{"name":"Destination","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"运价目的地：票价的目的地。输出为：机场或城市三字码。","children":[]},{"name":"Carrier","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"航空公司（承运人）两字码","children":[]},{"name":"Fbc","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价基础：票价的运价基础。不含Ticketing code modifier和Ticketing designators的运价基础。 可以不填","children":[]},{"name":"RuleTariff","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价的rule tariff：输出运价的tariff。这是按航线选择的值，航司在运价发布的时候就做好了coding，直接输出。","children":[]},{"name":"Rule","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价的rule number：输出运价的rule。这是航空公司自己编的4位字符，可以是数字也可以是字母。","children":[]},{"name":"Private","type":"boolean","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"是否私有：用于表示运价是否是私有 true：是私有运价 false：不是私有运价","children":[]},{"name":"FareDataForReprice","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Fare信息：Data used for uniquely identifying a fare for a re-price transaction. The format is the following: fare component id::pricing unit number::carrier code::origin::destination::tariff code::rule number::fare class (fbc)::fbc override::currency code::one-way or round-trip::global indicator code (GI)::origin addon routing number::routing number::destination addon routing number::origin addon ftnt1::origin addon ftnt2::ftnt1::ftnt2::destination addon ftnt1::destination addon ftnt2::origin addon tariff::destination addon tariff::ticket designator 1::ticket designator 2::account code::cat19-22 discount record3::fare amount in NUC::fare amount in equivalent currency::equivalent currency code::tour code::live date and time::fare source (ATPCO / SITA / DIT).","children":[]},{"name":"FareDataForDiagnostics","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Fare信息：add-on 1 origin::add-on 1 destination::add-on 1 price amount in filed currency::add-on 1 price filed currency::add-on 1 price amount in equivalent currency::add-on 1 price equivalent currency::add-on 1 price in NUC::specified fare origin::specified fare destination::specified fare price amount in filed currency::specified fare price filed currency::specified fare price amount in equivalent currency::specified fare price equivalent currency::specified fare price in NUC::add-on 2 origin::add-on 2 destination::add-on 2 price amount in filed currency::add-on 2 price filed currency::add-on 2 price amount in equivalent currency::add-on 2 price equivalent currency::add-on 2 price in NUC::fare filed PTC::cat 19-22 filed ptc::ruleTariff name::fare direction (I/O)::cat 35(L, T, C or blank if no category 35)::cat 35 fare carrier::cat 35 fare ruleTariff::cat 35 fare ruleNumber::cat 35 coupon type::fare type::ticketing code::ticketing code modifier::historical TTL::fare gi::unsellable indicator::equivalent currency selling price min::equivalent currency selling price max::published currency selling price min::published currency selling price max::routing tariff::origin add-on routing tariff::destination add-on routing tariff::tpm","children":[]},{"name":"PrimeRbds","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"主RBD","children":[{"name":"Rbd","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"订座舱位：订座舱位","children":[]}]},{"name":"FbcOverride","type":"string","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"打在票上的运价基础：是包含Ticketing code modifier的运价基础。","children":[]},{"name":"TicketDesignator1","type":"string","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"ticketDesignator1：ticketDesignator1，通常为CH75或NW等尾缀。但是从票上无法得知尾缀到底是TD1还是TD2，所以把所有尾缀都放在TD1中。8位，不满加空格","children":[]},{"name":"Tier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"tier：非品牌运价时不存在","children":[]},{"name":"BrandName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"品牌名：非品牌运价时不存在","children":[]},{"name":"Penalty","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"【此数据仅供参考】从cat16读到的退改规则数；旅客退改时的费用，和航段使用状态、退改时间、退改office等信息相关，","children":[{"name":"Change","type":"array","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"换开","children":[{"name":"BeforeDeparture","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"全部未使用","children":[{"name":"Allowed","type":"boolean","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"是否允许noshow：是否允许noshow 取值： 允许：true 不允许：false","children":[]},{"name":"Price","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"税金：税金","children":[{"name":"Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"金额：金额","children":[]},{"name":"Currency","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"货币：货币（同新票支付货币）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AfterDeparture","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"部分使用","children":[{"name":"Allowed","type":"boolean","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"是否允许noshow：是否允许noshow 取值： 允许：true
